message: Is there anyone out here tried to publish a mobile app with 2 versions (ad-supported & premium ad-free) in the local market (egypt)? and if yes ; is it worthwhile , are people here really are willing to pay money for such value of just removing ads ?

data.message: Every app is different, why don't you do it and see for yourself?
no form my experience if your application is targeting the local market "middle east" most of the users don't understand it is an ad aslan :D so they wont pay to remove ads !

It's pretty rare to someone in Egypt actually paying for software offline.. let alone online! it's a culture that we all contributed in developing when we handed out people cracked software and pirated movies.. we are all guilty :-)
Why you use 2 different version .. Make one version with ads and Apple allows to remove ads by paying money this is an important  feature with inapp-purchase
Mohamed El-Alfy Great; if you tired, was it effective?
I know the culture is not that accepting paying for software ; but what if they pay for other services like premium calls or SMS ..?
